ED_Title: Extension of the procedure for taking decisions of the General Assembly during the coronavirus disease (COVID-19) pandemic until the end of August 2020
ED_DecisionText: On 21 July 2020, the General Assembly, on the proposal of its President (A/74/L.76), decided that its decisions 74/544 of 27 March 2020 and 74/555 of 15 May 2020 shall continue to be in effect until the end of August 2020.
ED_Disclaimer: The final version of decisions adopted during the resumed part of the session will be contained in the official record of the GA (A/74/49 (Vol. III)) after editorial review.
